td.content: s:patient presents with moderate nausea for more than 5 weeks. patient is a 28 YO f winemaker. denies any smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 173 cm, Weight 79.9 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.
